snippet: Joel Berry II and his North Carolina teammates had already wrapped up an Atlantic Coast Conference regular-season title and a No. 1 seed in next week's tournament before tipping off against rival Duke....

headline.main: Boxing: Underdog Bellew Stuns Haye in Heavyweight Clash
headline.print_headline: Boxing: Underdog Bellew Stuns Haye in Heavyweight Clash

lead_paragraph: Joel Berry II and his North Carolina teammates had already wrapped up an Atlantic Coast Conference regular-season title and a No. 1 seed in next week's tournament before tipping off against rival Duke.
